video.title: The L Word
video.synopsis: This trailblazing series follows the tangled lives and ever-changing relationships among a close-knit group of lesbians who call Los Angeles home.

episodes.synopsis: After moving in next door to longtime couple Bette and Tina, talented young writer Jenny intermingles with their circle of lesbian friends.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Jenny begins to realize that her Midwest college education may not have prepared her for life, lust and love in Los Angeles.
episodes.title: Pilot: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Bette and Tina wait eagerly to see whether Tina will get pregnant. Meanwhile, Tim asks Marina to a dinner party, unaware of her encounter with Jenny.
episodes.title: Let's Do It

episodes.synopsis: As Jenny struggles with her feelings for Marina, Bette engages in a battle of wills with the chairman of the gallery board and takes a desperate step.
episodes.title: Longing

episodes.synopsis: Despite her work problems, Bette greets Tina's pregnancy with delight, and Jenny's life with Tim is jeopardized by her relationship with Marina.
episodes.title: Lies, Lies, Lies

episodes.synopsis: Tim and Jenny marry in haste after he catches her with Marina. Meanwhile, Bette is dismayed by her father's reaction to Tina's pregnancy.
episodes.title: Lawfully

episodes.synopsis: As a rising New York City artist tests Bette's commitment, the sperm donor's girlfriend starts harassing a lonely Tina.
episodes.title: Losing It

episodes.synopsis: While Bette struggles with her fears about parenthood, Dana runs from her fears -- and from Lara.
episodes.title: L'Ennui

episodes.synopsis: Identities -- sexual and otherwise -- come into question as Jenny tries to explain her situation to her onetime roommate.
episodes.title: Listen Up

episodes.synopsis: As Bette faces serious personal and professional problems, Dana starts to find herself. Meanwhile, fame -- with complications -- finds Shane.
episodes.title: Luck Next Time

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected opportunity eases Tina's grief, while Bette defends the gallery against a right-wing attack.
episodes.title: Liberally

episodes.synopsis: Bette prepares for the gallery's new show and hires Candace, an attractive female contractor, to handle the setup.
episodes.title: Looking Back

episodes.synopsis: A near-riot at the gallery lands Bette and her friends in jail, putting her in dangerous proximity to Candace.
episodes.title: Locked Up

episodes.synopsis: Tina finds out about Candace. Meanwhile, Marina dates Robin and rings Jenny, Shane's patrons turn on her, and Dana loses a friend but gains a fiancée.
episodes.title: Limb from Limb

episodes.synopsis: Bette begs Tina to forgive her, unaware that Tina is keeping a shocking secret from everyone. Meanwhile, Alice and Dana keep things on the down low.
episodes.title: Life, Loss, Leaving

episodes.synopsis: Tina brings in a high-profile lawyer to handle her split from Bette, Kit becomes owner of the group's home-based café, and Jenny confronts Robin.
episodes.title: Lap Dance

episodes.synopsis: Jenny tries to impress her writing teacher, Kit searches for a performer for the Planet's grand opening, and Tina discovers an upsetting e-mail.
episodes.title: Loneliest Number

episodes.synopsis: Tensions mount when Tina uncovers the truth about her lawyer, and a business venture turns sour for Bette. Meanwhile, Kit falls under a guru's spell.
episodes.title: Lynch Pin

episodes.synopsis: As things heat up between Alice and Dana, Bette and Tina's reconciliation hits a snag. Meanwhile, Shane starts work for a Hollywood power player.
episodes.title: Labyrinth

episodes.synopsis: As Tina weighs her feelings for Helena, Kit scores with Benjamin, and Jenny gets closer to Carmen. Meanwhile, frustrated Alice takes a stand.
episodes.title: Lagrimas de Oro

episodes.synopsis: As Tina gets involved in Helena's child-custody battle, Dana and Alice make their relationship public, and Shane tries to overcome heartache.
episodes.title: Luminous

episodes.synopsis: Tina and Bette give their relationship another go, Jenny fears she's lost a writing assignment, and Shane searches for answers at church.
episodes.title: Loyal

episodes.synopsis: Jenny learns the surprising truth about a macho television star. Meanwhile, Alice shocks Dana with a bedroom-related request.
episodes.title: Late, Later, Latent

episodes.synopsis: Dana, Alice, Shane, Jenny and Carmen go on a lesbian cruise to the Caribbean. Back on land, Kit and Bette try to get reacquainted with their father.
episodes.title: Land Ahoy

episodes.synopsis: The truth is revealed about Dana's brother, Bette and Kit's father takes a turn for the worse, and Jenny's childhood secret comes to light.
episodes.title: Loud and Proud

episodes.synopsis: Forced to put her father in a nursing home, Bette turns to Tina for support. Meanwhile, repressed memories haunt a confused Jenny.
episodes.title: L' Chaim

episodes.synopsis: Bette's life turns upside down when an unexpected guest attends her dad's funeral. Meanwhile, Tina undergoes a difficult labor, and Jenny seeks help.
episodes.title: Lacuna

episodes.synopsis: New parents Tina and Bette struggle to fit romance in around diaper changes and feeding times. Meanwhile, an angry Alice gets behind the wheel.
episodes.title: Labia Majora

episodes.synopsis: Kit brings in over-the-top party planner Billie Blaikie to spice up the Planet. Meanwhile, Helena discovers that Alice can't let go of Dana.
episodes.title: Lost Weekend

episodes.synopsis: Alice still can't get over Dana, but new relationships bloom as Kit befriends Angelica's nanny and Jenny introduces the gang to Moira.
episodes.title: Lobsters

episodes.synopsis: Bette testifies at a Senate hearing, Dana makes a shocking on-air announcement at a tennis match, and Carmen serves as DJ for a music mogul.
episodes.title: Light My Fire

episodes.synopsis: As Dana comes to terms with her biopsy results, Jenny tries to help Moira, Alice dates a lesbian vampire, and Bette is hit with a double-whammy.
episodes.title: Lifeline

episodes.synopsis: Bette gives Tina the go-ahead to explore her feelings for men. Meanwhile, Carmen gets serious with Shane, and Billie shares information with Moira.
episodes.title: Lifesize

episodes.synopsis: In her quest to become Max, Moira begins hormone injections. Meanwhile, Shane and Carmen take the next step toward commitment.
episodes.title: Lone Star

episodes.synopsis: Jenny holds a fundraiser to help with Moira's medical expenses, and Helena plans a group trip to celebrate Dana's recovery.
episodes.title: Late Comer

episodes.synopsis: Jenny begins to wonder whether she can handle Moira's transformation to Max. Meanwhile, Dana develops a new outlook, and Bette tries Buddhism.
episodes.title: Lead, Follow or Get Out of the Way

episodes.synopsis: As Dana's health worsens, Alice rushes be by her side, and Helena's mother comes to town to sort out her daughter's legal problems.
episodes.title: Losing the Light

episodes.synopsis: When Dana's family shuns the friends at her funeral, Alice holds a memorial service so the group can properly honor Dana.
episodes.title: Last Dance

episodes.synopsis: The friends throw themselves into organizing Carmen and Shane's wedding. In between the planning, Shane reunites with her estranged family.
episodes.title: Left Hand of the Goddess

episodes.synopsis: Determined to get custody of her daughter, Bette kidnaps her baby and runs far away from Tina. Elsewhere, Shane returns to her self-destructive ways.
episodes.title: Legend in the Making

episodes.synopsis: Alice meets a Latina who claims to have seduced more than 1,000 women. Meanwhile, Tina is forced to fire Helena, and Bette takes a new job as a dean.
episodes.title: Livin' La Vida Loca

episodes.synopsis: Bette's life becomes even more complicated when Phyllis comes out as a lesbian. Meanwhile, Jenny seeks revenge on a book critic.
episodes.title: Lassoed

episodes.synopsis: With a wary eye on Phyllis and Alice's relationship, Bette uses her diplomatic skills to smooth out a dispute with an important donor.
episodes.title: Layup

episodes.synopsis: Awkwardness reigns as Helena attempts to cater a party at Phyllis' house, where Alice meets Phyllis' husband, Leonard.
episodes.title: Lez Girls

episodes.synopsis: Bette continues to worry that her career will be affected by Phyllis and Alice's breakup. Later, Papi teaches Helena and Alice how to play poker.
episodes.title: Luck Be a Lady

episodes.synopsis: Helena loses a high-stakes game of poker to Catherine. Meanwhile, Alice tries her best to comfort Tasha, who's haunted by memories of Iraq.
episodes.title: Lesson Number One

episodes.synopsis: Alice and Tasha can't agree on much but find that have plenty of sexual chemistry together. Elsewhere, Helena sinks deeper into debt.
episodes.title: Lexington and Concord

episodes.synopsis: Phyllis' distraught husband drops by to seek advice and sympathy. Elsewhere, Bette struggles to keep her jealousy in check.
episodes.title: Lacy Lilting Lyrics

episodes.synopsis: Bette's controlling behavior threatens to derail her relationship with Jodi. Meanwhile, Kit is drinking again thanks to Angus' recent infidelity.
episodes.title: Little Boy Blue

episodes.synopsis: Tasha's commanding officer orders her to keep her sexuality under wraps. Elsewhere, Bette learns that Jodi has received a job offer.
episodes.title: Literary License to Kill

episodes.synopsis: Tina returns to a lesbian lifestyle, while Bette tries to get Jodi back. Elsewhere, Helena makes a desperate bid to break free from Catherine's grip.
episodes.title: Long Time Coming

episodes.synopsis: Shane gets cold feet about moving in with Paige. Elsewhere, Jenny comes up with a plan to snag the director's chair for the film version of Lez Girls.
episodes.title: LGB Tease

episodes.synopsis: Tina hits the dating scene again but can't shake her Bette baggage. Meanwhile, Shane's new gig sets the stage for a series of spicy encounters.
episodes.title: Look Out, Here They Come

episodes.synopsis: As Tina's dating life improves, Shane decides to take a break from sex. Meanwhile, Tasha prepares to face allegations of "homosexual conduct."
episodes.title: Lady of the Lake

episodes.synopsis: Shane struggles to maintain her self-imposed celibacy, the newest Bond girl vies for the lead in Jenny's film, and the Planet faces competition.
episodes.title: Let's Get This Party Started

episodes.synopsis: Jenny hosts a mixer for the women to mingle with their actress counterparts in Lez Girls, and a closeted athlete's antigay comments shock Alice.
episodes.title: Lookin' At You, Kid

episodes.synopsis: Moviemaker Jenny is forced to contend with her difficult star, Niki. Meanwhile, Dawn and Cindi elevate the SheBar's war against the Planet.
episodes.title: Lights! Camera! Action!

episodes.synopsis: Niki's agent and the Lez Girls production team struggle to rein in their star, and Tasha meets the hardnosed military attorney prosecuting her case.
episodes.title: Lesbians Gone Wild!

episodes.synopsis: Niki's publicists insist that she attend her film premiere with a male companion. Meanwhile, Tasha faces trial.
episodes.title: Laydown the Law

episodes.synopsis: Trapped together in an elevator during a blackout, Tina and Bette reignite old passions. Back on the set, Jenny grows jealous of Niki's male co-star.
episodes.title: Liquid Heat

episodes.synopsis: Tina catches Niki and Jenny in a compromising position, and Adele tries to calm Tina with assurances that the two won't be seen together in public.
episodes.title: Lifecycle

episodes.synopsis: Ruthless competitors make their moves on Jenny and Kit. Meanwhile, a sex-tape scandal forces Jenny out of the director's chair.
episodes.title: Lunar Cycle

episodes.synopsis: Shane distances herself from Molly, whose mother doesn't approve of their union, and Jenny learns a shocking secret at the wrap party for Lez Girls.
episodes.title: Loyal and True

episodes.synopsis: In the season opener, a gathering at Bette and Tina's turns fatal when one of the friends is found dead in the swimming pool.
episodes.title: Long Night's Journey into Day

episodes.synopsis: Old flames popping up for both Bette and Helena complicate their respective lives. Meanwhile, Tasha and Alice try couples counseling.
episodes.title: Least Likely

episodes.synopsis: Tina's troubles with Lez Girls continue when the film's negative is stolen. Meanwhile, Alice makes a decision that could affect her career.
episodes.title: LMFAO

episodes.synopsis: Bette and Tina meet with a potential birth mother. Meanwhile, Dylan wants to get back in touch with Helena but needs Tina's help.
episodes.title: Leaving Los Angeles

episodes.synopsis: Jenny sells another movie script, but it borrows heavily from someone else's work. Meanwhile, Alice and Tasha each develop a crush on Jamie.
episodes.title: Litmus Test

episodes.synopsis: At Max's baby shower, Jenny spills the beans about Niki, causing Helena to go into a tailspin. Meanwhile, Bette and Tina's plans to adopt hit a snag.
episodes.title: Lactose Intolerant

episodes.synopsis: A dance marathon for charity brings out the competitive side in every girl, and Alice begins to suspect something is going on between Tasha and Jamie.
episodes.title: Last Couple Standing

episodes.synopsis: In the series finale, Bette and Tina prepare to start a new life in the Big Apple, and Alice wants Tasha to make a decision about their relationship.
episodes.title: Last Word
